articles.content: Papayas enzyme, papain promotes faster digestion, relieves constipation and promotes hydration. Hence, all these features help to lose weight.

articles.author: David Nield
articles.title: Beethoven's DNA Reveals Musical Genius Just Might Lie in Any of Us - ScienceAlert
articles.description: It's one of the biggest questions in science: to what extent are we defined by our genetics? A new analysis of Ludwig van Beethoven's DNA, showing a low predisposition for beat synchronization, hints that we can become much more than our genes suggest.
